Posts.Content: I have endometrial cancer and they have given me taxatere as a chemotherapy med. I am now taking Radiation for this cancer. What keeps me going everyday is that I think positive that I'm going to get through it and beat it. I'm 35 years old and it seems like it will never end but it will. I hope you will find the strength to push forward. If u need anything just let me know. My name is Christina. You take care! :)
Posts.Title: New Diagnosis
